name: Last Light (itch) (xihan118)
description:
Last Light is a trial to create a shooter in a realistic environment from models generated by Geopipe, it's a one-man effort to something AA so expect some bugs here and there but I hope the game overall will not displease you!

Please watch this walkthrough video if you are having difficulties completing the game or stuck!

Some known bugs are:

(1) On options, the native resolutions button is not working.

(2) The saving system not spawning the player in the right position.

With these said the game is brief so please play it with an open mind :) 

Here are some resources used in making of this project:

Geopipe and CBU: Apocalypse Edition for the environment.

Weapons and weapons animations are from DJMaesen from sketchfab.

Footstep and weapons audios are from Gamemaster audio

The enemies are from Sci-Fi Mega Pack Volume 2 by Protofactor

The Ammo box is from this page.
